Package com.fellowship.edgar

Class TextBreakeDown

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fellowship.edgar.TextBreakeDown
  • public class TextBreakeDown
extends java.lang.Object
    This class processes text in order to generate statics in terms of its words, phrases, paragraphs, among others.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Edgar Roman

      • numberOfSentences

        public java.lang.String numberOfSentences​(java.lang.String theText)
        Method that calculates the number of sentences that a text has. Each sentence is separated by a period.
        Parameters:
        theText - Text to be Analyzed.
        Returns:
        As a String the number of sentences in the text.

      • numberOfParaphs

        public java.lang.String numberOfParaphs​(java.lang.String theText)
        Method that calculates the number of paragraphs that a text has. Each paragraphs is separated by a period and enter.
        Parameters:
        theText - Text to be Analyzed.
        Returns:
        As a String the number of paragraphs in the text.

      • numbersOfBigrams

        Returns:
        As a String the number of bigrams in the text.

      • wordsByLength

        public java.lang.String[] wordsByLength​(java.lang.String theText)
        Method that shows how many words are in the text classified by their length.
        Parameters:
        theText - Text to be Analyzed.
        Returns:
        An array of Strings where the position i represents the number of letters of a word and the number inside the position i represents the ocurrency of this word in the text.

      • whatLanguage

        public java.lang.String whatLanguage​(java.lang.String theText)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Method that detects the text language.
        Parameters:
        theText - Text to be Analyzed.
        Returns:
        The code language (two letters) of the detected language
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • expandedLanguage

        public java.lang.String expandedLanguage​(java.lang.String language)
        Method that converts the code language (two letters) into a full word of the languages detected
        Parameters:
        language - The code language
        Returns:
        The language detected in one full word (not two letters).

        Method that removes all punctuation signs of the Text
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        String with the text to be analyzed without punctuation signs.
